Introduction

BE:MAX, formerly MUSTB, is a 5-member boy group that consists of Taegeon, Wooyeon, Doha, Soohyun, and Sihoo. They debuted on January 21, 2019, under MUSTM Entertainment.

On April 21, 2019, MUSTB was involved in a car accident, following the car accident Hawoon and Sangwoo both left the group. On November 7, 2023, MUSTM Entertainment announced that the members' exclusive contracts with the label have been terminated.

The group rebranded from MUSTB to BE:MAX on July 6, 2024. The group is currently under KPlus Entertainment / Team Otter. BE:MAX re-debuted with the single "Down Down" on July 30, 2024.
